name: LizLocalRichmond
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
There's always so much to do and see in Richmond and its surrounding areas. Liz Local brings you this week's events happening in the Richmond - festivals, concerts, local food, beer, wine, and much more.

Click the "Enable" button to activate this briefing. Then, ask Alexa, "what's my flash briefing" to hear the latest Richmond news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
